name: Fellowship United Methodist Church
description: United Methodist church providing worship services and Celebrate Recovery program. Offers spiritual guidance and support for individuals dealing with addiction and life challenges through faith-based recovery meetings.
source: Verified from official Facebook page, CR Locator, and Google search results
hours_of_operation: Celebrate Recovery program: Fridays at 6:00 PM
eligibility_requirements: Open to all seeking spiritual guidance and recovery support
populations_served: Individuals dealing with addiction, life challenges, and those seeking spiritual community
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2025-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from CR Locator (https://crlocator.com/results/f5323ad8-7b16-4d10-8d78-b4ee6513c33c). Address and phone number confirmed through Google search results and Yelp listing (https://www.yelp.com/biz/fellowship-methodist-church-somerset). Facebook page (https://www.facebook.com/FellowshipKYUMC/) verified as active with 190+ followers. Ministry leader Jill Bryant confirmed through CR Locator. Celebrate Recovery program details verified from CR Locator showing Friday 6:00 PM meetings. All information cross-referenced with multiple sources for consistency.
